body:
(it's not trivial because the primitives don't have batched computation
support)

On Jul 3, 2017 10:40 AM, "ebrevdo" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'm looking into this, adding cusparse support is nontrivial. I wouldn't
> expect anything until August at the earliest. For now we go have a GPU
> accelerated sparse_tensor_dense_matmul.
>
